data.title: Beyonc√© makes surprise NYFW appearance at Luar show to support model nephew Julez
data.meta_description: Beyonc√© sat front row to watch her model nephew, Daniel "Julez" Smith Jr., walk the runway at the Luar show during New York Fashion Week on Tuesday night.
data.text:
Coolest aunt ever.

Beyonc√© sat front row to watch her model nephew, Daniel ‚ÄúJulez‚Äù Smith Jr., walk the runway at the Luar fashion show Tuesday night.

The ‚Äú16 Carriages‚Äù hitmaker, who this week released two new country songs, rocked an embellished cowboy hat in line with her new musical era as she watched 19-year-old Julez strut down the catwalk.

The mom of three, 42, wore a sparkling silver blazer dress by Gaurav Gupta Couture, which she paired with matching thigh-high boots, round shades and an iridescent Luar bag ($265) to match.

Julez‚Äôs mom and Beyonc√©‚Äôs sister, Solange Knowles, beamed with pride as she watched her son model the label‚Äôs latest collection at New York Fashion Week.

Solange, who shares Julez with ex-husband Daniel Smith, posted several images of her son on her Instagram Story after the show.

At the show, Beyonc√© sat next to her mom, Tina Knowles, who was one proud grandmother as she snapped endless pics of Julez on the runway.

The 70-year-old rocked a black blazer and long brown leather gloves, as well as gold jewelry and a matching ring.

‚ÄúJulez closing out Fashion Week walking for @Luar Raul these clothes are fire !!!‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è,‚Äù Tina wrote on Instagram.

In a follow-up post, the doting grandmother added, ‚ÄúJulez My Baby‚ù§Ô∏èüî• thanks to the Talented Raul designer extraordinaire!! Yes to @Luar.‚Äù

Beyonc√© announced this week that she will release the highly anticipated second act of her critically acclaimed ‚ÄúRenaissance‚Äù album on March 29.

The 32-time Grammy winner dropped two new songs from the country project, titled ‚ÄúTexas Hold ‚ÄòEm‚Äù and ‚Äú16 Carriages,‚Äù on streaming services during the 2024 Super Bowl.

The ‚ÄúHeated‚Äù hitmaker posted a Western-themed video teasing her country music era in addition to the cover artwork for its dual lead singles.

The singer‚Äôs fans have been eagerly awaiting ‚ÄúAct II‚Äù since the release of ‚ÄúRenaissance‚Äù in July 2022.

She followed up the 16-song dance-driven project with a lucrative world tour, which ran from May 10, 2023, to Oct 1, 2023. She later released a concert film.
